name: MEC Trail HT Waist Pack - Unisex
categories: Shoulder bags, slings and waist packs
description: A compact and stable waistpack to use for hiking or travel. The wide padded waistbelt and cinch straps on the bottle holsters keep everything secure and riding close to your centre of gravity. When you need less support, remove the padding for a lower profile look or to convert to a shoulder bag.2 moulded bottle pockets (bottles not included) with shockcord keeper loops.Reflective cord on front for visibility and lashing on extra gear.Large zippered compartment with interior pocket and key clipSmall external pocket.Foam padding with airmesh backer on back and hipbelt for comfort.Foam padding on hipbelt can removed to use the webbing waistbelt alone or to convert it to a shoulder bag.
